title: Very important person [Study extract]
creator_credit: Ken Annakin, Leslie Parkyn, Julian Wintle, Society for Education in Film and Television and Rank Organisation Film Productions
brief_description: An extract from “Very Important Person”, directed by Ken Annakin. Features Farrow’s relations with other prisoners who suspect him of being a spy, his accidental discovery of the escape tunnel, and his encounter with the Camp Commandant on parade. Cast includes James Robertson Justice, Leslie Phillips, Stanley Baxter, Eric Sykes, Richard Wattis.
